qualifier:
Unprotected write. Non-private method `com.alipay.sofa.rpc.client.AbstractCluster.checkProviderInfo` indirectly writes to field `providerInfo.com.alipay.sofa.rpc.client.ProviderInfo.serializationType` outside of synchronization.
 Reporting because a superclass `class com.alipay.sofa.rpc.client.Cluster` is annotated `@ThreadSafe`, so we assume that this method can run in parallel with other non-private methods in the class (including itself).

Note that the prefix path providerInfo has been contaminated during the execution, so the reported race on providerInfo.com.alipay.sofa.rpc.client.ProviderInfo.serializationType might be a false positive.
